snippet: SCHNEIDER--Janice. We are saddened to announce the passing of Mrs. Janice Schneider, wife of our esteemed late partner and friend Daniel Schneider. Our deepest sympathy to her son Ronald, her daughters Jackie and Julie and their families. LIPSKY, GOODKIN & CO. PC 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHNEIDER--Janice. We are saddened to announce the passing of Mrs. Janice Schneider, wife of our esteemed late partner and friend Daniel Schneider. Our deepest sympathy to her son Ronald, her daughters Jackie and Julie and their families. LIPSKY, GOODKIN & CO. PC 1/3
